welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Yorkville, known for its historic architecture and bustling local shops. We invite you to soak up the city's charm and experience all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo shipments and freight services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dupage County Airport handles all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Dupage County Airport is exclusively used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport provides services for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lewis Lockport Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Greater Kankakee Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
